Title: OpenCover
Description: A code coverage tool for .NET 2 and above, support for 32 and 64 processes (including Silverlight) with both branch and sequence points.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A code coverage tool for .NET 2 and above, support for 32 and 64 processes (including Silverlight) with both branch and sequence points.

This is a mirror of the original github repository to allow codeplex users to contribute.

The latest downloads can be found here https://github.com/opencover/opencover/releases and is also available using nuget.

OpenCover also uses Atlassian Bamboo as a shared build server and you can review the output if you wish.
